/*   Anurag Anand  */
 
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cassert>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <cmath>
 
using namespace std;
 
inline int input()
{
       char c=getchar_unlocked();
       int n=0;
       while(c<'0' || c>'9') c=getchar_unlocked();
       while(c>='0' && c<='9') n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0',c=getchar_unlocked();
       return n;
}
 
 
int main()
{
    int nCase;
    scanf("%d",&nCase);
    while(nCase--)
    {
       int num;
       num=input();
       int sqroot=(int)sqrt(num*1.0);
       printf("%d\n",sqroot);
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;  
}
